channel.title: Legends Arceus on Zukan Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Legends Arceus on Zukan Docs

item.title: ExeFS
item.description: Legends Arceus (ExeFS) # Hayabusa Notable facts: # Uses Lua 5.3 Uses Sol for reflection between lua and cpp Notable Lua offsets: # Function Description Offset (1.0.0) lua_newstate Create a new LuaState struct 0x0006CF00 luaL_loadbufferx Loads a string of plaintext lua code 0x000555E0 lua_pcallk Calls loaded function on the stack 0x00052E10 lua_tostring Pops string off the lua stack 0x00050DA0 lua_settop Sets Lua stack 0x0004FF10 lua_gettop Gets Lua stack pos 0x0004FEF0 lua_type Get Lua type 0x00050310 luaB_print Prints lua value to stdout 0x00056880 Notes: # Dummy

item.title: RomFS
item.description: Legends Arceus (RomFS) # Hayabusa Romfs contents: # Path File Type Notes /bin/pml/personal/personal_data_total.perbin perbin Previously known as personal_total.bin /bin/pml/evolution/evolution_data_total.evobin evobin /bin/pml/waza/wazaXXXX.wazabin wazabin Notes: # Dummy
